last_posted.tweet: Option idea for SPY: Sep 19, 2025 bull call spread. Buy SPY 660C and sell SPY 670C with Sep 19 expiry. Rationale: Fed meeting and rate-cut expectations could lift markets; defined risk, limited upside.
last_posted.summary:
Overview: A Sep 19, 2025 SPY options spread is proposed, using a near-the-money long call and a slightly higher short call to create a defined-risk bet on upside.

Rationale: With the Fed meeting on the horizon (Sept 16â€“17) and expectations for rate cuts, a disciplined call spread can capture upside if equities rally, while capping losses to the net premium.

Risks: Time decay and a potential pullback beyond the strike are possible; ensure liquidity and sizing fit your risk tolerance.
